choices.name: MatchSameAsset
choices.choiceText:
Match Same Asset

(If selected, all assets referenced by any cases already attached to the incident will be attached to the incident directly.)

choices.name: MatchSameProduct
choices.choiceText:
Match Same Product

(If selected, all assets that share a same product as any assets already attached to the incident will be added to the incident.)

choices.name: NearbyAsset
choices.choiceText:
Nearby Assets

(If selected, all open cases who's assets are within distance of an incident's asset will be added)

recordLookups.name: Get_Manual_Incident_to_Add_Merge
recordLookups.label: Get Manual Incident to Add Merge

fields.name: categorizationcompletetext
fields.fieldText:
Categorization Stage Complete

click finish to submit

fields.name: caseaddconfirm_0
fields.fieldText: Click Next to confirm adding {!AssetCount} asset(s) to the incident from report "{!selectedReport.Name}". Otherwise, click previous.

fields.name: caseaddconfirm
fields.fieldText: Click Next to confirm adding {!caseCount} case(s) to the incident from report "{!selectedReport.Name}". Otherwise, click previous.

fields.name: confirmcompletetext
fields.fieldText:
All categorization steps completed.


Cases added to Incident: {!caseCount}

Assets added to incident: {!AssetCount}

Incidents merged: {!mergeCount}

fields.name: What_would_you_like_to_do
fields.fieldText: What would you like to do?

fields.name: displaymergeconfirmation
fields.fieldText: Confirm merging {!mergeCount} incidents to parent incident. Clicking Next will perform the merge.

fields.name: whattodo
fields.fieldText: What would you like to do with this incident?

fields.name: displayMerge
fields.fieldText: The incidents below will be merged to the target incident above.

fields.name: merge_action
fields.fieldText: What would you like to do?

fields.name: norecordsdisplay
fields.fieldText: No records to add. Click previous and modify your selection

fields.name: removeIncidentsText
fields.fieldText: Deselect any incidents to remove from the collection

screens.name: Select_report_to_add_cases_from
screens.label: Select report to add cases from

fields.name: selectReportDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select a report that contains the list of cases you'd like to add to the Incident. Please ensure the report is a tabular report with CaseID in the first column.

screens.name: Select_report_to_add_cases_from_0
screens.label: Select report to add cases from

fields.name: Distance_Radius_miles
fields.fieldText: Specify distance radius (miles) if nearby assets selected

fields.name: selectReportDisplayText_0
fields.fieldText:
All open cases that reference any assets found by above selections will also be attached to the incident.


Optionally, also select a report that contains the list of assets you'd like to add to the Incident. Please ensure the report is a tabular report with AssetID in the first column.
